name: UpMail
description:
UpMail is a B2B SaaS sales acceleration platform supporting sales teams to increase one-to-one email communications productivity and sales conversion rates. 

INCREASE PRODUCTIVITY 
UpMail is designed to productively create and send one-to-one sales communications: 
- Interface and libraries adapted to quickly search and find templates and content from various formats 
- Technology to insert and display content to maximise impact of communications 
- Platform architecture designed to improve how sales and marketing work together 

SUPERCHARGE SALES COMMUNICATIONS WITH OPTIMISED CONTENT 
- UpMail recommendation engine provide suggestions of optimal content based on analytics to create highly personalised sales communications. 
- Streamline one-to-one sales communications 

OPTIMISE YOUR SALES FUNNEL 
UpMail provides reporting, tracking, and real-time actionable intelligence to optimise every step of their sales funnel.

jobs.title: Operation Manager / Human Swiss-knife
jobs.description:
UpMail is changing the way salespeople use emails and we’re having great success digitalising what tend to be a very traditional industry. We’re doing this with in an innovative recommendation engine suggesting users what to say and which content to share, making it easy and accessible for everyone to increase sales performance.

As part of our growth, we are looking for an Operation Manager to help implement our ambitious strategy and shape the future of our company. You will be a critical member of UpMail, part of a small and passionate team in our West London office.

The role itself is highly varied and you will be expected to be flexible working directly with clients and be the cornerstone between Commercial, Customer Success and Technical teams to plan, coordinate and deliver critical projects for the growth of the business.

This opportunity comes at an exciting point in our journey: we’ve grown our client base in over 15 countries, which now includes well-known hotel groups like Radisson Hotel Group, NH Hotels, Wyndham, Jurys Inn, Virgin, and Best Western.

We’ve most recently launched commercial partnerships with a few global players in the industry and we're getting ready for additional global expansion.

This position is ideal for someone commercially driven with strong project management and technical skills, able to take ideas and turn them into tangible outcomes, working with various parties within tight deadlines.

RESPONSABILITIES

• Lead global initiatives to drive operational excellence across all units of the business 
• Define, implement and optimise business processes and procedures
• Ensure a premium experience for our clients by understanding their business objectives, key KPIs and ensure that UpMail delivers against them.
• Identify and develop new opportunities for expansion across the customer's business. 
• Find effective ways to execute and deliver projects, which can include the management of internal and external resources as well as the implementation of new technologies and processes.

REQUIREMENTS

• An ambitious individual with a strong backbone for operational efficiency operating at the startup pace.
• An entrepreneurial hunger to progress a career and to develop key skills and knowledge across the entire business.
• +3-4 years of experience in one or several of the following discipline for a technology company: Business or Operation Manager, Account Manager, Customer Success, Product Manager or Project Manager.
• Super resourceful, sometimes creative and self-starter able to work independently and within a team
• Very organised and thorough approach to delivering projects
• Strong technical abilities, willing to learn new technical concepts and adopt new software quickly 
• Comfortable with the rapid, unpredictable nature of a tech startup
Excellent communication skills with impeccable written English

*Desirable but not essential*

• Industry experience in B2B Sales, Hospitality an/or SAAS businesses
• Experience running a business

BENEFITS

• Great and open-minded company culture built by an international team
• High degree of autonomy to plan and executing goals
• High versatility in the type of projects
• Incredible opportunity to create meaningful, scalable and successful tech company
• Competitive salary and equity
• Fun and friendly co-working space based in White City (W12)
• Pension
• CycleScheme (Government’s Green Transport Initiative).
